recommendations.title: Revenue Stabilization Program
recommendations.recommendation: Implement demand forecasting and dynamic pricing strategies

recommendations.title: Seasonal Campaign Optimization
recommendations.description: Large seasonal revenue gap: 83.1% between Winter and Spring
recommendations.recommendation: Develop targeted promotions for Spring and maximize Winter performance

recommendations.title: Cross-Selling Campaign
recommendations.description: Best cross-selling opportunity: Beauty → Sports (50.0% success rate)
recommendations.recommendation: Create bundled product offerings and targeted email campaigns

recommendations.recommendation: Invest in expanding underperforming categories and reduce dependency risk
